name: Aughild's Ultimatum
flavorText: Aughild had 50 demands that had to be met before he would spare the lives of the nobles. Those demands are written in the wrappings of these bracers.
flavorTextHtml: Aughild had 50 demands that had to be met before he would spare the lives of the nobles. Those demands are written in the wrappings of these bracers.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [3.5 - 4.0]%

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Reduces damage from melee attacks by 2.0%(3) Set:     
 Reduces damage from ranged attacks by 2.0%.
